result.title: Transversal contribution from the project to the guidelines and toolkits
result.description: D5.5. Transversal Contribution from the project to the guidelines and toolkit, that will be a transversal output of the project, summarizing all the relevant issues developed in the deliverables that would be of interest to the decision makers. Special attention would be paid to the specificity of the basins and social environment where the developments could apply, and to the inter-sectorial interactions that may illuminate synergies and dependencies among them (M9).
